fields.name: Check_Medicare_Text
fields.fieldText: Please review the Medicare Items below along with the cycle history. If you need to add additional Medicare items to this claim please select the additional Medicare items button.

fields.name: ClaimOnly
fields.fieldText: Please review the Billing Items below along with the cycle history.

value.stringValue: Name:260, Date_of_Service__c:260, Doctor_Providing_Service__c:260, Price__c:185, Claim_Type__c:180, Referral_Expiry__c:260, Referring_Doctor__c:260

fields.name: HistoryText
fields.fieldText: The below table outlines the history of the cycle.

fields.name: ClaimItemDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Please select from each claim item below to allocate a claim type.

fields.name: InsuranceStatusText
fields.fieldText: The patient's health insurance status is: {!InsuranceFormula}

value.stringValue: [{"label":"Bulkbill","value":"Bulk Bill"},{"label":"Eclipse","value":"Eclipse"},{"label":"Patient Claim","value":"Patient Interactive Claim"},{"label":" Medicare Exempt","value":" Medicare Exempt (Doctor Billing Only No Claim)"}]

fields.fieldText: Please confirm you are processing a claim for the below clinic.

fields.name: ExisitingClaim
fields.fieldText: WARNING: A claim already exists for this cycle. Please think carefully before proceeding.

fields.name: No_Ref
fields.fieldText: No valid referral was found on this patient file and as such a claim cannot be processed. Please check referral validity and try again.

fields.name: CannotProcess
fields.fieldText: This cycle still has an outstanding amount owed on it. Please check all invoices on this cycle displayed below to confirm that you are happy for them to be outstanding before processing the claim.

fields.name: distext
fields.fieldText: Please be aware that this appears to be a short cycle and will be listed as such, please check previous records to confirm.
